I noticed the the new missions are due in 11 days.  Is Kai sa gonna go down to 6300be within 11 days?  Cause on past "New" champs with missions, the mission due date was long enough till the price of the champ went down, so many can have the chance to do it.

Iirc the schedule for new champions is:

Release: 7800 IP/BE for champion, bundle with release skin (one week)
7 days after release: bundle leaves, price drops to 6300
Second week after release: champion goes on free rotation

Which is my roundabout way of saying that yes, her price will drop before the mission expires. Unfortunately we only get three days to do it, but at least we only spend 6000 BE instead of 7500 (accounting for the 300 returned by the mission).
Do they always follow this exact schedule?  Cause I remember some champs in the past being 7800 for 2 weeks.
